participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Emily is passionate about her dreams and has a strong connection to her rural roots.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake enjoys adrenaline-pumping activities and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith.
